org.docheinstein.mp3doctor.song.player

Interface SongPlayer.SongPlayerListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MainWindowController
    Enclosing class:
    SongPlayer

    public static interface SongPlayer.SongPlayerListener
    Interface that let listeners to observe the state of this player and the state of song it is handling at the moment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onSongFinished(Song song)
      Called when the song is finished (because all the song has been played, not because it has been stopped).
      void onSongProgress(Song song, double current, double duration)
      Called each second when a song is playing, exports details about the current elapsed time and the total duration of the song.
      void onSongStart(Song song)
      Called when a new song is started via SongPlayer.play(Song) or an analog method.
      void onSongStopped(Song song)
      Called when the song is stopped via SongPlayer.stop() or SongPlayer.pause().

    • Method Detail

      • onSongStart

        void onSongStart(Song song)
        Called when a new song is started via SongPlayer.play(Song) or an analog method.
        Parameters:
        song - the song that has been started

      • onSongProgress

        void onSongProgress(Song song,
                    double current,
                    double duration)
        Called each second when a song is playing, exports details about the current elapsed time and the total duration of the song.
        Parameters:
        song - the song that is playing
        current - the amount of millis elapsed from the start of the song
        duration - the total duration of the song in millis

      • onSongStopped

        void onSongStopped(Song song)
        Called when the song is stopped via SongPlayer.stop() or SongPlayer.pause().
        Parameters:
        song - the song that has been stopped

      • onSongFinished

        void onSongFinished(Song song)
        Called when the song is finished (because all the song has been played, not because it has been stopped).
        Parameters:
        song - the song that has finished to be played
